title: Fixed Satellite Communication Station
explain: Fixed satellite communication station is a satellite communication earth station and used in many fields such as satellite broadcasting, communication, satellite telemetry and telecontrol, etc.
features:
Features

  • Service: voice, data and image
  • Large transmission capacity, multiple-channel high-rate carriers can be simultaneously transmitted
  • Multiple-service, large-capacity and high quality service transmission can be realized
form:
Specifications
Operation bandC / Ku / Ka
Antenna aperture1.2m-2.4m, optional
PA power1W ~ 1kW, optional
Data rate64kbps~8Mbps
